name: 陳文輝
objective:
本課程旨在以實例探討，培養學生具備從事學術工作所需之研究能力。課程內容主要包括：研究問題定義與假設、研究規劃、資料收集、文獻評論、理論方法、研究倫理、案例探討，研究報告撰寫等。
The aim of this course is to help students develop the ability for conducting academic research through the study of practical problems. The contents of this course include defining research problems and hypothesis, research design, data collection, literature review, methodology, research ethics, case studies, and writing up.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
week 2 Literature review
week 3-4 Data collection & analysis
week 5-6 Reference management software 
week 7-8 Writing format styles
week 9 midterm 
week 10-11 Research frameworks
week 12-13 Research design
week 14-15 Sampling & statistics
week 16  Quantitative research & qualitative research
week 17-18 Final presentation
